LinesAnswers.name: bezVochilyNenado
LinesAnswers.line: Hey, man. Don't say anything, it pisses me off. You know, I haven't had a drink for a week, almost a week, four days, and I feel so healthy and energetic. To be honest, all my life I've been drinking at work and at home, but then I ran out of money on a trip, I miscalculated and drank all money away. Now only healthy leaving, detox - at least that what I read on the Internet, so...

LinesAnswers.name: giveVodka
LinesAnswers.line: Hey, man. Don't say anything, it pisses me off. You know, I haven't had a drink for a week, almost a week, four days, and I feel so healthy and energetic. To be honest, all my life I've been drinking at work and at home, but then I ran out of money on a trip, I miscalculated and drank all money away. Now only healthy leaving, detox - at least that what I read on the Internet, so...

responses.response: Man, I don't know what you read on the Internet, but I have a bottle of vodka. I don't need it, let me give it to you, and your mood will improve. (Give the booze to the plumber)

LinesAnswers.name: fix
LinesAnswers.line: Oh, I feel like I was in a dream, without the booze. Now it's different, all the detox has gone down the drain. Young man, listen to me, you're good. Can't you fix something? When I drink, I have a clever pair of hands, I mean, they don't shake, but I gave out my tools for booze too...

responses.response: The guys over there have a broken treadmill, please fix it, here's the tool.
The window in the car's toilet is broken, it would be bad if someone will catch a cold because of it, here's the wrench - fix it please.

responses.response: The window in the car's toilet is broken, it would be bad if someone will catch a cold because of it, here's the wrench - fix it please.

LinesAnswers.name: smthingFixed
LinesAnswers.line: Eh, I really have a clever pair of hands, let's drink for it.
